Hi {!Account.Contact__c},
I hope you had a chance to check out our first email, where we shared how to connect with our support team. I wanted to follow up and remind you that we’re here for any questions or updates, big or small! Whether you need help with:
Website edits Updates to your home search tool Answering any questions Setting up integrations
We’ve got you covered!
You can enhance your website management skills with our LIVE training webinars. Whether you're new or looking to improve, these sessions are perfect for learning and asking questions.
We offer an overview of the dashboard every Monday and Wednesday, and advanced training every Thursday.
Click here to register for the basics training. Click here to register for the advanced training.
For more details, please refer to our knowledge base article.
We look forward to seeing you there!
Best, The Luxury Presence Support Team
